A

arc - package arc
 

C

clear() - Method in class arc.Console
Clears any text in the top layer
close() - Method in class arc.TextInputFile
Close the text file
close() - Method in class arc.TextOutputFile
Close the open text file
closeConsole() - Method in class arc.Console
Closes the console window and exits the program
closeWindow() - Method in class arc.Console
Closes the console window without exiting the program
Useful for multi-window applications
Console - Class in arc
ARC Console
Console() - Constructor for class arc.Console
Create a standard Console window
Resolution: 960x540
Title: Console
Console(String) - Constructor for class arc.Console
Create a Console window with a specific title
Console(int, int) - Constructor for class arc.Console
Create a Console window with specific dimensions
Console(String, int, int) - Constructor for class arc.Console
Create a Console window with a specific title and dimensions
currentChar() - Method in class arc.Console
Immediately returns the current character pressed if any
No waiting for a key to be pressed
Can be used for realtime input
currentKey() - Method in class arc.Console
Immediately returns the current keycode pressed if any
No waiting for a key to be pressed
Can be used for realtime input
currentMouseButton() - Method in class arc.Console
Immediately returns the current mouse button being pressed
Realtime input
currentMouseX() - Method in class arc.Console
Immediately returns the X location of the mouse
Realtime input
currentMouseY() - Method in class arc.Console
Immediately returns the Y location of the mouse
Realtime input

D

drawArc(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw an arc at the designated coordinates and angles
drawImage(BufferedImage, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw an Image at the designated coordinates
Anchor point for the image will be top left corner
drawLine(int, int, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw a line at the designated coordinates
drawOval(int, int, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw an oval at the designaged coordinates with the designated width and height
Anchor point for the oval will be the top left corner
drawPolygon(int[], int[], int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw a polygon at the designated coordinates
drawRect(int, int, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw a rectangle at the designated coordinates with the designated width and height
Anchor poirnt for the rectangle will be the top left corner
drawRoundRect(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw a rounded rectangle at the designated coordinates with the designated width and height
Anchor poirnt for the rectangle will be the top left corner
drawString(String, int, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Draw a string at the designated coordinates
The string will be drawn in the lower draw layer

G

getChar() - Method in class arc.Console
Reads the next character pressed without waiting for the return key
getKey() - Method in class arc.Console
Reads the next character pressed without waiting for the return key
Returns an integer keycode for that character
You can use this method to capture arrow presses or other special keys

L

loadFont(String, int) - Method in class arc.Console
Load a font based on a filename and returns a Font object
The object can be used in the setTextFont and setDrawFont methods
Can only load ttf (TrueType) fonts
loadImage(String) - Method in class arc.Console
Load an image based on filename and returns a BufferedImage object
The object can be used in the drawImage method
Can only load jpg, png, and gif (not animated) picture files

R

readChar() - Method in class arc.Console
Reads a character from the top layer and returns a char
If the user enters multiple characters before pressing enter, only the first character will be returned
readChar() - Method in class arc.TextInputFile
Read a line of text from the opened text file and get the first character
readDouble() - Method in class arc.Console
Reads a double number from the top layer and returns a double
readDouble() - Method in class arc.TextInputFile
Read a line of text from the opened text file and convert it to a double
readInt() - Method in class arc.Console
Reads an integer number from the top layer and returns an int
readInt() - Method in class arc.TextInputFile
Read a line of text from the opened text file and convert it to an integer
readLine() - Method in class arc.Console
Reads a line of text from the top layer and returns a String
readLine() - Method in class arc.TextInputFile
Read a line of text from the opened text file
repaint() - Method in class arc.Console
Repaints the lower draw layer
Any draw methods that were executed before this will be finally drawn on the console draw layer
Fill the "draw buffer" with shapes and colors and use this method to draw that buffer to the screen

S

setBackgroundColor(Color) - Method in class arc.Console
Set the color of the brackround of the entire Console window
Draws a full window filled rectangle in the color specified to the lower draw layer

Sets the color for the lower draw layer
setDrawFont(Font) - Method in class arc.Console

setTextFont(Font) - Method in class arc.Console
Sets the font of the text in the top pauer controlled by print methods

Pauses the program for the designated number of milliseconds
